trends: There have been 37 other sightings in Fort Lauderdale
There were no other sightings in Fort Lauderdale on or around April 21st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsAround 10.30 Pm. i went out to smoke and i saw a strange red light coming from north est going south west passing over south Fort Lauderdale and north hollywood it was only a big and strong red light no flashing but more like fading in and out (not like a regular red strobe on a plane) but slowly fading in and out and i did not heard any noise. there was no green and with strobe.altitude about 3000-5000 feets. speed about 250 miles per hours. i lost the view blocking by some trees all the sighting stand for about 30 seconde.
